lead_paragraph: Nikola Mirotic scored 28 points and Jimmy Butler added 21 to lead the Chicago Bulls to a 103-100 win over the Houston Rockets on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Mirotic Scores 28 as Bulls Edge Rockets 103-100
headline.main: Mirotic Scores 28 as Bulls Edge Rockets 103-100

snippet: Nikola Mirotic scored 28 points and Jimmy Butler added 21 to lead the Chicago Bulls to a 103-100 win over the Houston Rockets on Thursday night....
